alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 12:24PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Harrison and southeastern Hancock Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Long Beach, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Diamondhead, D`iberville, Lyman and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 16 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
